Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
pants \pants\ n. 1. n. pl. A garment extending from the waist to the knee or ankle, covering each leg separately.
Syn: trousers. [WordNet 1.6]
2. Underpants.
Syn: drawers. [PJC]
3. Specifically: Underpants worn by women; panties.
Syn: bloomers, drawers, panties. [WordNet 1.6]

pants n 1: (usually in the plural) a garment extending from the waist to the knee or ankle, covering each leg separately; "he had a sharp crease in his trousers" [syn: {trousers}] 2: (usually in the plural) underpants worn by women; "she was afraid that her bloomers might have been showing" [syn: {bloomers}, {drawers}, {knickers}]
